metadata.title: CVE-2015-3429 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in example.html in Genericonsbefore 3.3.1, as used in WordPress before 4.2.2, allows remote attackers toinject arbitrary web script or HTML via a fragment identifier.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
